text:
I would like to suggest that the authentication howto for apache 2.x (http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/howto/auth.html) be updated include a reference to the Satisfy directive and maybe a little bit of text detailing its usage.

The old 1.3 howto includes details about Satisfy, but the new docs don't.  As a relatively inexperience admin, it took me about five times longer than it should have done to figure out how to configure mod_access and mod_auth to work together in an either/or fashion (i.e. Satisfy Any) - and that was only after a little lateral thinking caused me to check the old 1.3 howto.

I'm not entirely sure if a bug report is the correct mechanism for this suggestion, but looking at the docs project page (http://httpd.apache.org/docs-project/) it appears to be.
creator: jeremyhooks@googlemail.com
